Defiance Increases Leverage On MicroStrategy Tracking ETFs | Binance News on Binance Square
news_content: According to PANews, ETF issuer Defiance announced on Tuesday that it will increase the leverage ratio of its funds tracking MicroStrategy's stock price to match that of competitor T-Rex. In a statement, Defiance said, 'The daily target exposure for MSTX and SMST ETFs will be increased from 1.75x and 1.5x to 2x, respectively. As theBTCmarket rises, high-risk funds based on MSTR have attracted significant investor inflows. Increasing the leverage ratio will keep the issuer's ETFs competitive.'

news_title: Meta Reports Significant Losses In Metaverse Business | Binance News on Binance Square
news_content: According to PANews, Meta's latest financial report reveals that its metaverse business continues to incur substantial quarterly losses. On Wednesday, Meta announced its third-quarter earnings, indicating that the Reality Labs division, responsible for developing augmented reality (AR) and virtual reality (VR) technologies, experienced an operating loss of $4.43 billion. This loss is slightly lower than the $4.68 billion anticipated by analysts surveyed by StreetAccount.  Reality Labs' revenue for the third quarter increased by 29% year-over-year to $270 million, falling short of analysts' expectations of $310.4 million. The division primarily generates revenue through the sale of Meta's Quest VR headsets and Ray-Ban Meta smart glasses.  Meta, formerly known as Facebook, entered the VR market in 2014 with the $2 billion acquisition of VR startup Oculus. CEO Mark Zuckerberg believes that developing VR and AR technologies will position the company as a leader in the next major personal computing platform. However, this investment has been costly for Meta, with Reality Labs' cumulative operating losses exceeding $58 billion since 2020.

news_title: Cryptocurrency Market Sees $104 Million in Liquidations Over 24 Hours | Binance News on Binance Square
news_content: According to Foresight News, data from Coinglass reveals that the cryptocurrency market experienced liquidations totaling $104 million over the past 24 hours. Long positions accounted for $68.13 million of the liquidations, while short positions amounted to $35.45 million.  Bitcoinsaw liquidations of $20.81 million, andEthereumexperienced liquidations of $21.86 million. The significant liquidations in both long and short positions indicate heightened volatility in the cryptocurrency market.

news_title: SEC Receives Application To Convert Grayscale Digital Large Cap Fund To ETF | Binance News on Binance Square
news_content: According to BlockBeats, on October 31, Nate Geraci, President of The ETF Store, announced on X that the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has officially confirmed receipt of the application to convert the Grayscale Digital Large Cap Fund (GDLC) into an exchange-traded fund (ETF). The SEC is currently seeking public comments on the matter.  Previously, on October 15, Grayscale Investments submitted an application to the SEC to convert its mixed cryptocurrency fund, which includes Bitcoin, Ethereum,Solana,XRP, andAvalanche, into an ETF. The company has already converted its Bitcoin and Ethereum funds into ETFs. According to the official website, the product, named the Grayscale Digital Large Cap Fund (GDLC), is currently traded over-the-counter and has assets under management (AUM) of $524 million. The fund is primarily composed of Bitcoin (nearly 75%) and Ethereum (approximately 19%), with the remaining portion consisting of Solana, XRP, and Avalanche.

news_title: Major Security Breach Affects Multiple Decentralized Applications | Binance News on Binance Square
news_content: According to Decrypt, a significant security breach has impacted several decentralized applications (dApps) due to malicious code injected into Lottie Player, a popular JavaScript animation library. The attack exploited recent updates to Lottie Player’s npm package, specifically versions 2.0.5 through 2.0.7, where hackers embedded harmful code within JSON files that display animations on websites. At least one individual has lost 10BTC(US$723,000) after unknowingly signing a phishing transaction linked to the breach, according to Scam Sniffer, a platform designed to protect users from online fraud.  Blockaid, a cybersecurity platform monitoring the incident, confirmed that the attackers deployed a fake wallet connection prompt, leading users to the drainer malware

news_title: Meta And Microsoft Shares Drop Despite Strong Q3 Earnings | Binance News on Binance Square
news_content: According to Cointelegraph, shares of Meta Platforms Inc. and Microsoft Corp. declined in after-hours trading on October 30, despite both companies reporting strong third-quarter earnings. Executives from both firms reduced their earnings outlook and forecasted increased spending on artificial intelligence (AI), which contributed to the drop in share prices.  Meta reported a 19% year-on-year increase in Q3 revenues, reaching $40.59 billion, surpassing Wall Street estimates of $40.21 billion. The company's earnings per share (EPS) were $6.03, exceeding the expected $5.19. Microsoft also posted impressive results, with revenues up 16% from the previous year to $65.59 billion, beating estimates of $64.41 billion. Microsoft's EPS came in at $3.30, above the anticipated $3.08.  Both companies, along with other major tech players like Google, Apple, and Amazon, have heavily invested in AI, launching new models and hardware to support the technology. Meta introduced Meta AI across its WhatsApp, Facebook, and Instagram platforms, which contributed to a strong quarter, according to CEO Mark Zuckerberg. Microsoft's earnings were bolstered by a 33% year-on-year growth in its AI-powered Azure business, surpassing expectations of 29% growth. CEO Satya Nadella highlighted that their AI business is on track to achieve an annual revenue run-rate of $10 billion next quarter, marking it as the fastest-growing business in the company's history.  Despite the positive earnings reports, Meta's shares fell 3.18% from $591.80 to $573, while Microsoft's shares dropped 3.71% from $432.53 to $416.50, according to Google Finance data. The decline in share prices was attributed to concerns over the companies' future spending on AI, with both signaling significant investments ahead with limited near-term results. Zuckerberg mentioned that Meta's AI investments would require substantial infrastructure and that the company had not yet finalized its budget. Financial chief Susan Li emphasized the focus on making Meta AI an engaging and valuable consumer experience, with monetization opportunities expected over time. Meta projected its full-year capital expenditures to be between $38 billion and $40 billion, with significant growth anticipated in 2025.  Microsoft's outlook for the current quarter indicated that its core AI offering, Azure, is expected to grow between 31% and 32%, slightly down from the 33% growth posted last quarter. The company also projected revenues for the current quarter to be between $68.1 billion and $69.1 billion, below analyst expectations of $69.89 billion.

news_title: Curve Finance Founder Highlights Geopolitical Risks of Over-Collateralized Stablecoins | Binance News on Binance Square
news_content: According to Foresight News, Cointelegraph reports that Curve Finance founder Michael Egorov recently highlighted the increasing prominence of potential risks associated with over-collateralized stablecoins. Egorov pointed out that these risks are not necessarily the reserve-related risks typically mentioned by investors but rather geopolitical risks stemming from government regulations.  Egorov emphasized that the underlying assets supporting collateralized stablecoins, such as cash deposits in financial institutions and government securities like U.S. Treasury bills, are susceptible to asset freezes and seizures. This vulnerability to government actions poses a significant risk to the stability and reliability of these stablecoins.

news_title: Binance Blockchain Week Dubai 2024: Highlights from Day 1 | Binance News on Binance Square
news_content: The first day of Binance Blockchain Week 2024 burst to life at the Coca Cola Arena in Dubai on October 30, drawing a record crowd of crypto enthusiasts, industry leaders, and innovators eager to dive into the latest trends and ideas. One of the most impactful sessions of the day featured a fireside chat with Yi He, co-founder of Binance. In this engaging discussion, moderated by Alice Liu from CoinMarketCap, Yi shared her vision for the future of cryptocurrency and the broader Web3 ecosystem. She reflected on Binance's evolution and the crucial role of female leadership in the industry, emphasizing the need to bring more women into the crypto space. Yi passionately argued that diversity is key to fostering innovation and tackling the challenges facing the sector. Looking back at the journey of cryptocurrency from its early days to its current mainstream status, Yi declared, “The future has come.” She urged attendees to see this moment as a pivotal point in the adoption of digital currencies. Acknowledging the regulatory hurdles ahead, she made it clear that collaboration with regulators is essential for driving mass adoption: “If we want a billion users in crypto, we must cooperate with regulators.” Yi's vision goes beyond just increasing user numbers; she dreams of making crypto accessible for everyone, including those with limited tech experience. Her goal is for platforms like Binance to become integral tools for everyday life, empowering users to transact effortlessly. With over 230 million users already on Binance, she believes the next big step is to create practical applications that extend far beyond speculative trading. The day kicked off with an inspiring keynote from Khalfan Belhoul, the CEO of the Dubai Future Foundation. He discussed the Middle East's ambitious goal of becoming a global innovation hub. Belhoul highlighted Dubai's proactive approach to Web3, pointing out the region's regulatory advancements and technological innovations that are fueling its growth. His insights painted a vibrant picture of a region eagerly embracing emerging technologies, with the aim of attracting talent and investment in the crypto sector. He stressed the importance of collaboration among governments, corporations, and the community to fully harness the potential of Web3 technologies. As he wrapped up, it was clear that the Middle East is serious about establishing itself as a leader in this space. Another engaging discussion revolved around generative AI and its implications for the Web3 ecosystem. Moderated by Tracy Zhang from Followin AI, this panel brought together industry experts to debate whether generative AI is a blessing or a curse for the decentralized web. Panelists like Humayun Sheikh (Fetch.AI), Allen Yang (AWS), and Bruce Pon (Ocean Protocol) explored the dual nature of AI's role in Web3. They acknowledged that while generative AI can enhance user experiences by streamlining decentralized applications, it also presents significant risks, such as potential centralized control and increased surveillance. Sheikh made a compelling case for decentralizing the ownership of AI agents to avoid power being concentrated in the hands of a few corporations. The discussion highlighted the need for greater individual control over data in an increasingly AI-driven world. Ultimately, the panelists agreed that finding a balance between innovation and ethical considerations is crucial for nurturing a healthy Web3 environment. Another panel of the day focused on the evolving regulatory landscape for cryptocurrencies, aptly titled “Crypto Compliance: From the Streets to the Boardroom.” Moderated by Noah Perlman, Binance’s Chief Compliance Officer, the session featured notable figures like Irina Heaver (NeosLegal) and Tom Robinson (Elliptic). The panelists discussed the importance of international cooperation in establishing consistent regulatory standards, acknowledging the complexities posed by different legal frameworks around the world. They emphasized that proactive adaptation and collaboration between public and private sectors are essential for protecting the crypto ecosystem. Zumas, a police chief from Brazil, highlighted how private-sector compliance teams play a critical role in aiding law enforcement against crypto-related crimes. The panelists agreed that a community-driven approach to compliance, rooted in transparency and cooperation, is vital for the sustainable growth of the cryptocurrency industry. As Day 1 of Binance Blockchain Week 2024 came to a close, the anticipation for what was next was electric. Attendees were encouraged to tune in for Day 2's discussions, which promised to delve deeper into themes of innovation, regulation, and the future of finance. With an emphasis on practical applications and user engagement, the event aims to continue fostering meaningful dialogue and collaboration within the Web3 community. From expert panels to interactive workshops, the conference serves as a platform for industry leaders and newcomers alike to share knowledge and build connections. Binance Blockchain Week not only highlights the latest trends and challenges in the crypto world but also underscores the importance of collaboration, innovation, and inclusivity as the industry evolves. As Yi He aptly stated, “The future has come; this is the moment now.” Stay tuned for more updates and insights as we explore the exciting developments in the crypto landscape during this landmark event in Dubai.

news_title: South Korea Sees Significant Growth In Cryptocurrency Investments And Trading Volume | Binance News on Binance Square
news_content: According to PANews, a report from the Financial Services Commission of South Korea reveals that the number of cryptocurrency investors in the country reached 7.78 million in the first half of 2024, marking a 21% increase from 6.45 million in the second half of 2023. During the same period, the average daily trading volume of cryptocurrencies surged by 67%, rising from 3.6 trillion KRW to 6 trillion KRW. Additionally, the total market value of cryptocurrencies in South Korea grew by 27%, reaching 55.3 trillion KRW. The profits of 21 local cryptocurrency exchanges also saw a significant rise of 106%, amounting to 590 billion KRW.

news_title: Goldman Sachs Predicts Bank Of England To Maintain Rates In December | Binance News on Binance Square
news_content: According to Odaily, Goldman Sachs now anticipates that the Bank of England will keep interest rates unchanged during its December meeting. This marks a shift from their previous forecast, which predicted a 25 basis point cut.

news_title: Crypto Fear And Greed Index Remains In Extreme Greed State | Binance News on Binance Square
news_content: According to Foresight News, data from Alternative.me indicates that today's Crypto Fear and Greed Index stands at 77, the same as yesterday, signifying an 'Extreme Greed' state in the market. This index reflects the current sentiment and emotions of the cryptocurrency market, suggesting that investors are exhibiting high levels of greed.

news_title: Worldcoin Appoints New General Manager For South Korea | Binance News on Binance Square
news_content: According to PANews, Tools for Humanity, the developer behindWorldcoin, has appointed Park Sang-wook as the General Manager for its South Korean branch. Park brings extensive experience from his previous roles at prominent companies such as CJ Entertainment, YouTube, Uber, and Spotify.

news_title: A16z Crypto Warns Of Scam Invitations For Podcast Participation | Binance News on Binance Square
news_content: According to PANews, a16z Crypto has issued a warning on the X platform about scammers using domains that appear to belong to the company to invite individuals to participate in their podcast. The company emphasized that if you receive an invitation to join their podcast through a guest curator seemingly associated with them, a proposal based on research about your company, a scheduling tool similar to Calendly, or from employees who are not part of the podcast team, these are fraudulent messages. a16z Crypto clarified that they only invite guests directly or through mutual acquaintances. They advised recipients of such emails to be cautious about clicking on links and to avoid sharing information with unknown individuals.

news_title: Mark Cuban Receives 475 ETH From Genesis Trading Address | Binance News on Binance Square
news_content: According to Odaily, blockchain analyst @ai_9684xtpa reported that 11 hours ago, Mark Cuban received 475ETH(approximately $1.28 million) from a Genesis Trading-associated address. This transaction marks his first Ethereum activity in three months. Cuban's involvement in cryptocurrency trading dates back to 2017 when Ethereum was priced at $400. Data from Rootdata indicates that he has also invested in notable projects such as Polygon,Arbitrum, and Swell.

news_title: Bitcoin Trades at Discount in South Korea Amid Market Uncertainty | Binance News on Binance Square
news_content: According to BlockBeats, a recent report by Kaiko revealed thatBitcointraded at a discount of approximately 1% in the South Korean market last week, marking the second occurrence of such a discount since September. Historically, Bitcoin has traded at a premium in South Korea due to the country's unique regulatory framework, which restricts cross-border capital transfers by foreign users. This premium has reached as high as 50% in the past. In March of this year, as Bitcoin reached an all-time high, the 'Korean market premium' surged to 10% before falling to 1-2% during the summer.  It is noteworthy that previous instances of a negative 'Korean market premium' have often signaled a broader rebound in the cryptocurrency market. However, this time, the market remains uncertain, particularly with the upcoming U.S. presidential election.

news_title: US Treasury Releases Digital Asset Report Highlighting Rapid Growth | Binance News on Binance Square
news_content: According to Foresight News, the U.S. Treasury Department has released a report on digital assets, noting a rapid increase in the overall scale of digital assets from relatively low levels. The report highlights that stablecoins are involved in 80% of cryptocurrency transactions, which has subsequently driven demand for short-term U.S. Treasury bonds. Despite this growth, the overall market for digital assets remains relatively small compared to traditional financial assets such as stocks or bonds.  The report also indicates that institutional trading of cryptocurrencies may lead to an increased demand for hedging with short-term Treasury bonds in the future. It emphasizes the need for careful consideration of operational, legal, and technical risks when making design choices around technological infrastructure and tokenization.

news_title: Kazakhstan Launches Pilot Project Showcasing CBDC Programmability | Binance News on Binance Square
news_content: According to Odaily, Kazakhstan has initiated a new pilot project to demonstrate the programmability of its Central Bank Digital Currency (CBDC). The National Bank of Kazakhstan (NBK), in collaboration with the Ministry of Finance, has made significant progress in handling Value Added Tax (VAT) refunds. Binur Zhalenov, the Chief Digital Officer of NBK, shared on LinkedIn that the use of the digital tenge CBDC in business-to-business transactions has automated the tagging of VAT, reducing the waiting time for exporters' refunds from 70-75 days to 10-15 days. The goal is to achieve instant refunds in the near future. This efficiency improvement is attributed to the tax authorities of the State Revenue Committee eliminating manual checks. Zhalenov also mentioned that pilot projects are being developed to adopt the digital tenge in public procurement, targeted financing by the national sovereign wealth fund, and investment subsidies.

news_title: Bitcoin Whitepaper Marks 16th Anniversary | Binance News on Binance Square
news_content: According to BlockBeats, October 31 marks the 16th anniversary of the release of theBitcoinwhitepaper titled 'Bitcoin: A Peer-to-Peer Electronic Cash System' by Satoshi Nakamoto on the P2P Foundation website.  The Bitcoin network was officially launched on January 3, 2009, with an initial trading price of $0.0008. Since its inception, Bitcoin has appreciated over 90 million times in value.  As per the latest market data, the current price ofBitcoinstands at $72,309, with a total market capitalization of $1.43 trillion.

news_title: Bank Of Japan Maintains Policy Rate Amid Economic Uncertainty | Binance News on Binance Square
news_content: According to Odaily, the Bank of Japan (BOJ) has decided to keep its policy rate unchanged, aligning with widespread market expectations. The central bank reiterated its commitment to achieving stable inflation and economic growth. This decision did not surprise most BOJ observers, as the BOJ Governor had previously expressed concerns about the increasingly uncertain global economic outlook. He also indicated that the BOJ has time to analyze risk factors, suggesting a cautious approach moving forward.  In its quarterly outlook report released on the same day, the BOJ projected that inflation would remain around its 2% target in the coming years. This closely watched report is likely to bolster expectations that policymakers may soon consider another rate hike.

BIG MYSTERY: $1 BILLION IN BITCOIN JUST MOVED TO BINANCE! | Mummy Money on Binance Square
news_content: The crypto world is buzzing with a mystery that could shake the market to its core. 🌀 In the dead of night, a wallet address linked to a long-dormantBitcoinwhale suddenly came to life – transferring a staggering $1 billion worth of Bitcoin to Binance. As the blockchain tracked the movement, traders and analysts scrambled to make sense of the massive shift. What could it mean? And who is behind this massive move? 😱 Speculation is running wild. Some believe this might be a bold play by a powerful institution ready to flood the market or take advantage of an upcoming event. Others whisper about potential regulatory crackdowns or secret insider information that only a select few might know. The transfer happened swiftly, with funds moving across multiple addresses before finally landing in Binance's wallet – all within an hour. The precision of the movement raised eyebrows, suggesting that this wasn’t just a routine transfer but a carefully planned operation. 🕵️‍♂️ Theories abound. Could it be a tech billionaire like Elon Musk making a surprise dive into Bitcoin after his recent comments about digital gold? Or perhaps a government entity quietly preparing for a crackdown or an asset seizure? Some even wonder if a major hacker or a group behind a notorious crypto heist has decided to cash out. 🔍 As more details emerge, one thing remains certain – the entire crypto market is on edge, and the suspense is palpable. Binance itself has remained tight-lipped about the sudden influx, refusing to comment on what this massive movement could mean for the exchange and the broader market. 🤐 This silence only fuels more speculation – is something big about to happen? Could this be the prelude to a massive market shift, or just a shadowy player moving assets for unknown reasons? As traders brace for potential volatility, the eyes of the crypto world remain fixed on Binance’s next move. 👀 WithBitcoin’s price already showing signs of fluctuation in response to the news, there’s an eerie feeling that something significant is on the horizon. Could this be the start of a major bull run, or the trigger for a catastrophic market drop? Either way, when $1 billion worth of Bitcoin suddenly starts moving, the world pays attention. 🌍 Stay tuned, because this story is far from over… 🚀 #ScrollOnBinance#BinanceSquareFamily#MYSTERY#Suspense

End Of The Road For Solana? Analyst Predicts 77% Price Crash To $40 | Crypto Breaking on Binance Square
news_content: In a surprising take, a crypto analyst has foreseen a crash in the price of Solana despite the ongoing bull momentum. This analyst is projecting a crash in the price of Solana, offering a fresh perspective on the crypto heavyweight. According to a crypto trader who goes by the name AlanSantana on TradingView and is very active on the trading platform, Solana’s trading volume in the past two months suggests the crypto is gearing up for a crash. Analyst Predicts Massive Crash For Solana AlanSantana observed that Solana’s trading volume has dropped significantly between September and October 2024, a development that often signals a bearish outlook and may suggest an upcoming downward price impulse. Inferring from this outlook, this suggests that the volume trend is pointing towards demand tapering off. The analyst also draws a contrast with last year’s trading activity, specifically from September to November 2023, when Solana’s volume was on the rise. This uptick in trading volume fueled a bullish rally that extended through the first quarter of 2024, with momentum carrying Solana to substantial highs by March. Based on the difference in two time periods and the current decrease in trading volume, the analyst suggested that there is a higher probability of Solana going in a main bearish direction. In light of this, he highlighted a Solana price crash below the $50 price level. Interestingly, a crash below $50 will effectively cancel out the gains in the past year and would return the cryptocurrency to its price range in November 2023.  SOL Whales Continue With Activity Solana is still largely in a bullish mode despite the decline in trading volume that was pointed out by AlanSantana. According to data from on-chain tracking firm Lookonchain, crypto whales are have upped their Solana trading activity in the past week, as evidenced by on-chain data. In a recent post on social media platform X, Lookonchain highlighted three instances of Solana whale addresses withdrawing SOL tokens from crypto exchanges and staking them. The largest withdrawal came from address “AA21…VxH9,” which moved 153,511 SOL tokens worth approximately $26.4 million from Binance to stake them. Another whale, identified by the address “EHax…gAUa,” withdrew 35,498 SOL tokens valued at $6.12 million from Binance and Kraken over the last three days, also staking the tokens. On the other hand, whale address “EGzi…mR7g” bought 13,000 SOL tokens worth $2.3 million from Binance to bring its total holdings to 95,651 SOL. Interestingly, another smart Solana whale address recently sold 26,726 SOL worth $3.86 million. This whale, known for buying low and selling high, currently holds 42,729 SOL, which are valued at $7.61 million. At the time of writing, Solana is trading at $178, up by 8% in seven days. The accumulation and momentum are bullish, and a crash towards $40 seems bleak at the moment. The post End Of The Road For Solana? Analyst Predicts 77% Price Crash To $40 appeared first on Crypto Breaking News.

🚨Elon Musk hints at Trump leading Harris by 69.420% as Biden faces strong criticism😱 | Research Expert on Binance Square
news_content: Elon Musk teased “69.420% coming soon” in a post about Trump’s lead over Harris, while Biden sparked backlash for allegedly calling Trump supporters “garbage.”  Elon Musk Hints at 69.420% After Trump-Harris Polls as Biden’s ‘Garbage’ Comment Sparks Uproar Tesla and Spacex CEO Elon Musk stirred attention on social media platform X on Wednesday by posting, “69.420% coming soon,” in response to a post about former U.S. President Donald Trump and Vice President Kamala Harris. His post was in reply to one by Doge Designer highlighting Trump’s lead over Harris in betting markets, where the former president held 67.0% compared to Harris’ 33.2%  Meanwhile, a separate controversy unfolded involving President Joe Biden, who faced backlash after allegedly labeling Trump supporters as “garbage” in response to comedian Tony Hinchcliffe’s remarks at a Trump rally, where Hinchcliffe called Puerto Rico “an island of garbage.” In an apparent reference to Trump, Biden stated:  The only garbage I see floating out there is his supporters. In response, Trump posted on X: “Joe Biden calls our supporters ‘garbage.’ You can’t lead America if you don’t love the American People. Kamala Harris and Joe Biden have shown they are both unfit to be President of the United States.” Biden’s remarks sparked Republican outrage. The White House later clarified, releasing a transcript showing Biden referred to Hinchcliffe’s words, not all Trump backers. Biden later expanded on this point on X, stressing that his intent was to criticize “the hateful rhetoric about Puerto Rico … as garbage,” noting that it didn’t reflect American values. #BinanceBlockchainWeek#BTCBreak71K

news_title: 🚨 XRP LAWSUIT UPDATE: Ripple Faces Pivotal Court Directive—What It Means for XRP’s Future 🚨 | Trader Rai on Binance Square
news_content: In a bold twist in the Ripple-SECsaga, the U.S. court has now urged Ripple Labs, CEO Brad Garlinghouse, and other executives to consider an alternative resolution to their ongoing lawsuit. This development has the potential to shapeXRP’s trajectory in the cryptocurrency landscape. Court Pushes for a New Resolution Strategy Ripple’s attempt for a conclusive ruling on class action claims has encountered a surprising pivot. Judge Phyllis Hamilton has requested that Ripple and the plaintiffs weigh a “voluntary dismissal without prejudice.” This legal maneuver could allow claims to be refiled individually in the future, adding a layer of complexity to the case and fueling uncertainty around XRP. Timeline & Key Dates to Watch Compliance Deadline: By November 4,Ripplemust either submit an amended order or announce its intent not to comply. Pretrial Conference: December 19, 2024 Jury Selection and Trial: January 21, 2025 Additionally, the SEC is doubling down, pushing to reinstate charges againstRippleexecutives Garlinghouse and Larsen, with final briefings due January 15, 2025. Ripple’s Critical Decision: What’s at Stake? Ripple’s response to the court’s directive could significantly impact the future of XRP. If Ripple opts for the alternative resolution, it may spare XRP from a drawn-out legal battle and soothe market jitters. However, rejecting the proposal could amplify legal risks, possibly sparking heightened market volatility and renewed uncertainty. The stakes forRipple—and XRP—have never been higher, and the crypto world is closely watching for Ripple’s next move. #BinanceNews#RippleVsSEC#XRPFuture#CryptoRegulations#BlockchainJustice $XRP

news_title: Russia Hits Google With a Colossal $20 Decillion Penalty, an Amount More Than the Whole Global Ec... | Cryptopolitan on Binance Square
news_content: A Russian court has fined Google $20 decillion. The amount surpasses the collective money supply in the world. Google caused offense to Russian media by blocking the accounts that belonged to multiple pro-Kremlin TV channels on YouTube. The penalty amount that has brought global attention to the case reflects the symbolic statement of their frustration towards Western tech companies. This is also escalating the tension between the tech giant and Russia following the international sanction to limit the country’s political and economic influence post-Ukraine invasion. The case was put forward by 17 Russian broadcasters which included Russia 1 and the platform related to Putin’s number 1 supporter, Margarita Simoyan. She is also a present from Russia Today. The Russian judges were bound to put a humongous fine on Google since they removed the abovementioned accounts under the restrictive measures. According to a Russian news outlet RBC, the Moscow judge described the fine as; “a case in which there are many, many zeros”. The fine was set at 100,000 rubbles daily multiplying every 24 hours since 2020. The resulting penalty sum has now grown into $20, 000,000,00 0,000,000, 000,000,000,0 00,000,000 not only exceeding Google’s total revenue of $88.2 billion and with a market cap of $2 trillion but also the total global economy estimate of $100 trillion as per World Bank.

For clarity, Section X of the Binance Terms of Use on “Resolving Disputes: Forum, Arbitration, Class Action Waiver ”shall apply in its entirety to your access to and use of the Platform, as if the same were expressly set out in these Terms.  20. These Terms written in the English language may be translated into other languages. In the event of any conflict between this English language version and other translated versions of these Terms, this English language version shall prevail.  _______________________________________ COMMUNITY GUIDELINES Users of the Platform (whether or not you are a user that is permitted to post content or comments on the Platform) must observe the following guidelines. These are common sense guidelines that apply to all users and users ’activities associated with users ’access to and use of the Platform. We will update this document regularly based on the development of the Platform community and services, and such terms shall be deemed incorporated into the Binance Square Community Platform Terms and Conditions, and you agree to be bound by the same. In order to maintain the Platform community, we reserve the right to deactivate any account, or deny access to any user, at any time for any behavior that is determined to be inappropriate or harmful. Possible actions include: deleting content and revoking access and usage rights. Please read these Community Guidelines and all other terms that are applicable to you carefully. Continuing to access or use the Platform will constitute your acceptance of our Community Guidelines and the applicable terms. If you do not agree, you should stop accessing and/or using the Platform. (1) Illegal Behavior When using our Platform service, you must comply with all applicable local, national/regional and international laws. Any content or activity that focuses on illegal activities, encourages, provides, or abets others to participate in illegal activities is prohibited. You also agree to immediately comply with any further instructions that we may issue to you from time to time, about your use of the Platform. This includes but is not limited to the type of content or the removal of links that you may have referred to as part of your content/comments posted or to be posted on the Platform insofar as we require such instructions to ensure that our Platform, and your use of the same, remain compliant with applicable legal and regulatory requirements. (2) Self-Destructive Behavior Any behavior that endangers one 's own life or mutilates one 's own body is prohibited. This includes, but is not limited to: suicide threats, intentional bodily harm, use of illegal drugs and excessive drinking or drinking illegal alcohol, and dangerous or distracted driving. No exceptions to such behaviors will be made as long as these self-harming behaviors can reasonably be inferred to cause bodily harm for the sake of stunts, pranks, or other forms of entertainment. (3) Calling Trades With Improper Intent Strongly recommending digital currencies listed on Binance, calling trades, and instigating users to purchase specific currencies with the intent of manipulating the market is strictly prohibited. You also agree to comply with any other terms and conditions and guidelines (including restrictions, if any), that may be conveyed to you from time to time (the terms of which shall also be deemed incorporated into these Terms), in relation to the content that you intend to transmit using the Platform. (4) Directing Behavior Excessively publicising and directing others towards Binance 's direct and indirect competitors is prohibited. (5) Violence/Threats Content depicting, glorifying, admiring or supporting terrorist/violent extremist acts or behaviors is prohibited, including making threats or encouraging others to commit acts that may cause serious bodily harm or major property damage to the population. (6) Hateful Behavior and Harassment Hateful behavior and harassing language and behavior are not permitted. Hateful behavior refers to any content or activity that promotes or encourages discrimination, degradation, harassment, or violence against the protected characteristics of others. These characteristics include: race, ethnicity, color, caste, ancestry, immigration status, religion, sexual behavior, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, disability, serious illness, and veteran status, etc. You must also refrain from conducting yourself in such a manner as to humiliate, abuse, attack, disrespect, harass, intimidate, threaten or slander other users of the Platform; or to provoke conflict and deliberately cause quarrels in the Binance community or the Platform generally. (7) Protect your identity We want our users to feel safe when sharing content on the Platform which is why we encourage you to let us know if any contents on the Platform (or re-posted content from the Platform) violate your privacy or sense of safety. If someone posted your personal information without your knowledge (including in private or sensitive circumstances), ask the uploader to remove the content. If you can ’t reach an agreement with the uploader, or if you are uncomfortable contacting them, you can request to have the content removed by contacting us atdpo@binance.com, giving a detailed explanation of the facts and description of the situation. The DPO team will assess the case. For content to be considered for removal an individual must be uniquely identifiable and that individual, or their legal representative, must submit the complaint. When assessing if an individual is uniquely identifiable, we consider the following factors: -Image of voice. -Full name -Financial information -Contact information -Other personally identifiable information. (8) How you can protect your Privacy on the Platform (9) Unauthorized Sharing of Personal Information Infringement of the privacy of others is prohibited. Sharing content that may reveal the personal privacy of another person or private property without permission is prohibited. This includes but is not limited to: * Sharing personal identification information (such as real name, location, or ID). * Sharing restricted or protected personal social media profiles or any information in such profiles. * Sharing content that infringes on what can reasonably be understood to be private content belonging to others. (10) Impersonation Impersonating another individual 's or organization 's content or activities is prohibited. Any impersonation of Binance personnel will not be tolerated. Such behavior will result in being banned. (11) Nudity, Pornography, and Other Obscene Content Nudity and other obscene content or activities such as pornography, sexual acts or intercourse, and sexual services are prohibited. Content or activities that threaten or promote sexual violence or abuse are strictly prohibited. Sexually suggestive content or activities are prohibited. (12) Violence and other indecent or improper acts and conduct Content that promotes or contains references to any violent, indecent or improper acts are prohibited. (13) Intellectual Property Examples of content that cannot be shared on the Platform without the permission of the copyright owner or without legal permission include: * Content from other Platform content creators. * Pirated games or unauthorized private server content. * Content from other websites (subject to all applicable terms, incorporating links to 3rd party websites as part of your content posted on the Platform, is however permitted). * Movies, TV shows, or sports events. * Music that does not belong to you or that you do not have the right to share. (14) Independent Views and Opinions. No endorsement by Binance In no circumstances should you attempt to indicate in any manner, without our prior written permission, that you are an employee of Binance or that we have endorsed your views or opinions, or any products or services mentioned by you for any purpose.
